edu.ncsu.csc216.shipping_simulator.simulation

Class SimulatorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.shipping_simulator.simulation.SimulatorTest

  • public class SimulatorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests the Simulator class and each of its methods (minus the constructor)
    Author:
    Aurora Bravo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimulatorTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Sets up the test by creating a simulator object, a station array, and a log
      void testAverageProcessTime()
      Test averageProcessTime by checking that zero is returned.
      void testAverageWaitTime()
      Test averageWaitTime() by checking that zero is returned Test method for Simulator.averageWaitTime().
      void testGetCurrentIndex()
      Tests getCurrentIndex() by checking that -1 is returned if null shipment.
      void testGetCurrentShipmentColor()
      Tests getCurrentShipment() by checking that null is returned if shipment is null, and that the correct color is returned for the type of package Test method for Simulator.getCurrentShipmentColor().
      void testGetStepsTaken()
      Tests getStepsTaken() by checking that the number of steps is 0 Test method for Simulator.getStepsTaken().
      void testItemLeftSimulation()
      Tests itemLeftSimulation() by checking that it returns false if item hasn't left the simulation Test method for Simulator.itemLeftSimulation().
      void testMoreSteps()
      Tests moreSteps() that there are more steps after calling steps step() three times Test method for Simulator.moreSteps().
      void testStep()
      Tests Step() by checking the amount of steps before and after a step Test method for Simulator.step().
      void testTotalNumberOfSteps()
      Tests the totalNumberOfSteps() by checking that the steps is twice the number of packages Test method for Simulator.totalNumberOfSteps().
